briefTitle: Sorbent Therapy of the Cutaneous Porphyrias

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult over age 21
* healthy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Intercurrent illness
* pregnancy

outcomeMeasures.title: Photosensitivity, Assessed by Measuring the Number of Minutes of Sun Tolerance
Protoporphyrin Concentration in Blood
outcomeMeasures.description:
1. erythrocyte protoporphyrin concentration, ug/dl
2. plasma protoporphyrin concentration, ug/dl
